title: kudittODi vArAi
sahitya:
kudittODi vArAi guhanE muruganE pAdAmbujac-cempor-shilambolikkavE


anupallavi

  nidhi nIyE ena ninaittiDum en mun matimukham kATTa magizhvuDan tuLLiyE


caraNam    veLLimalai Ishan iDabhAgam vaitta kiLLai mozhiyAL shivakAmi manam
 kOLLai koNDa kumaraiyyanE unnai aLLi aNaittiDa Ashai koNDEnE
